requirement_tested: Display a responsive webpage with ghost white background and slate gray components
user_persona: A casual sports fan browsing the website on a desktop computer.
user_goal: To view the website with consistent styling and layout.

narrative_steps.title: Loading the Website
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the sports analytics website in their browser and observes the overall look and feel of the page.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the homepage of the sports analytics website.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The entire page background is displayed in ghost white (#f8f9fa), and all major components like headers, cards, and containers have slate gray (#708090) borders and accents.

requirement_tested: Show a navigation bar with links to main sections: Home, Matches, Teams, Players, Analysis, Betting
user_persona: A user looking to explore different aspects of the basketball analytics platform.
user_goal: To navigate between various sections of the website easily.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Navigation Bar
narrative_steps.description: Sam lands on the homepage and notices the top navigation bar which contains all the main sections.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the top of the screen for the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The navigation bar is visible at the top of the page with six links: Home, Matches, Teams, Players, Analysis, and Betting.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Sections
narrative_steps.description: Sam decides to check out the player performance section and clicks on the 'Players' link.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Players' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The browser navigates to the Players section of the website, displaying relevant content.

requirement_tested: Provide a dashboard showing live and upcoming basketball matches with key details
user_persona: A user interested in viewing current and future basketball games.
user_goal: To quickly see all upcoming and live basketball matches with important information.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Taylor visits the homepage and scrolls down to the dashboard section where match cards are displayed.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the dashboard area of the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A central dashboard shows match cards representing live and upcoming games with teams, time, status, and score.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Match Details
narrative_steps.description: Taylor clicks on an upcoming match card to get more details about the game.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a match card in the dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A detailed view of the selected match appears, showing stats, predictions, and betting options.

requirement_tested: Enable users to browse detailed match history with scores, dates, and teams
user_persona: A basketball enthusiast wanting to review past games.
user_goal: To access and review detailed information about previous matches.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Match History
narrative_steps.description: Jordan navigates to the 'Matches' section and sees a table listing historical games.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Matches' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A table appears with columns for Date, Teams, Score, and Match Result.

narrative_steps.title: Sorting and Filtering
narrative_steps.description: Jordan wants to see only recent games, so he uses the filter options above the table.
narrative_steps.action: Use the sort/filter controls to change the view by date.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The match history table updates to show only the most recent matches based on the selected filter.

requirement_tested: Display team rankings with win-loss records, points, and statistics
user_persona: A user interested in seeing the overall strength of different basketball teams.
user_goal: To find out which teams are performing best in the league.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Team Rankings
narrative_steps.description: Morgan goes to the 'Teams' section to view team standings.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Teams' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A ranked list of teams is displayed with columns for Rank, Team Name, Wins, Losses, and Points.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Team
narrative_steps.description: Morgan clicks on the top-ranked team to see more detailed stats.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the first team in the ranking list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: More detailed stats and historical performance data for the selected team are shown.

requirement_tested: Show individual player performance metrics including scoring, assists, rebounds
user_persona: A fan who wants to track specific player stats.
user_goal: To analyze the performance of a particular basketball player.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Player Stats
narrative_steps.description: Casey looks up a favorite player's performance in the 'Players' section.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the 'Players' section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A bar chart and a table showing player statistics including PPG, Assists, and Rebounds are displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Charts
narrative_steps.description: Casey hovers over the bar chart to see exact numbers for each metric.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the chart bars.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltips appear showing precise numerical values for each stat.

requirement_tested: Implement data visualization charts for trends in team and player performance
user_persona: A data-driven sports analyst reviewing long-term trends.
user_goal: To understand how teams and players have performed over time.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Visualization Section
narrative_steps.description: Riley accesses the 'Analysis' section to view performance trends.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Analysis' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interactive charts such as line and bar charts are displayed showing trends in performance.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering Chart Data
narrative_steps.description: Riley selects a specific time range to focus on recent trends.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the time range control to select 'Last Month'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The charts update to show performance trends over the last month instead of all time.

requirement_tested: Offer match prediction models with confidence levels based on historical data
user_persona: A bettor seeking reliable predictions before placing wagers.
user_goal: To determine which team is likely to win based on statistical models.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Prediction Cards
narrative_steps.description: Jamie checks the prediction section to see forecasts for upcoming matches.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the 'Analysis' or 'Betting' section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Prediction cards display the predicted winner and a confidence percentage for each match.

narrative_steps.title: Getting More Info
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clicks on a prediction card to learn more about how it was calculated.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a prediction card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Additional details explaining the methodology behind the prediction are shown.

requirement_tested: Provide betting recommendations with odds and risk assessments
user_persona: A user looking for expert betting advice.
user_goal: To find recommended bets with associated odds and risk levels.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Betting Recommendations
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the 'Betting' section to see suggested wagers.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Betting' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Recommendation cards display recommended bets along with odds and risk assessments.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Full Details
narrative_steps.description: Alex clicks on a recommendation card to see full betting details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a recommendation card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal opens with comprehensive betting information and user-specific advice.

requirement_tested: Allow filtering and sorting of data by date, team, player, or category
user_persona: A user wanting to narrow down large datasets to relevant entries.
user_goal: To refine data views based on specific criteria.

narrative_steps.title: Using Filter Controls
narrative_steps.description: Jordan opens the filter panel and selects a date range to narrow results.
narrative_steps.action: Open the filter/sort controls panel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Filter controls including date picker, team dropdown, and player search field become available.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: Jordan applies the selected filters to update the displayed data.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Apply Filters' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The data view updates to reflect only the filtered results.

requirement_tested: Support real-time updates for live match scores and betting odds
user_persona: A user watching a live game and checking for score updates.
user_goal: To stay informed about live match progress and changing odds.

narrative_steps.title: Identifying Live Matches
narrative_steps.description: Lee scrolls through the dashboard and identifies live matches.
narrative_steps.action: Browse the dashboard section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Live matches are highlighted with a live indicator icon and updated scores.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Updates
narrative_steps.description: Lee watches the live match cards refresh periodically with new scores and odds.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for automatic updates or scroll through the live matches.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Scores and betting odds update automatically every few seconds.

requirement_tested: Include a search functionality to find specific teams, players, or matches
user_persona: A user searching for a specific basketball team or player.
user_goal: To quickly locate a desired team, player, or match.

narrative_steps.title: Using Search Bar
narrative_steps.description: Pat searches for a particular team using the search bar at the top of the page.
narrative_steps.action: Type the name of a team into the search bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Auto-complete suggestions appear as the user types.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Search Result
narrative_steps.description: Pat selects a suggestion to go directly to the team's profile page.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a search result.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The browser navigates to the appropriate team page or related content.

requirement_tested: Enable user account creation and login for personalized experience
user_persona: A new user who wants to save preferences and track betting history.
user_goal: To create an account and log in for personalized features.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Login Modal
narrative_steps.description: Sam clicks on the user icon in the top right corner to open the login interface.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the user icon in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A login/register modal pops up with fields for email and password.

narrative_steps.title: Creating Account
narrative_steps.description: Sam fills in the required fields and clicks 'Register' to create a new account.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in the registration form and click 'Register'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system validates the input and creates a new user account.

requirement_tested: Store and display user betting history and predictions in a profile section
user_persona: A returning user interested in tracking their past bets and predictions.
user_goal: To review their personal betting history and predictions.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Alex logs into their account using the login modal.
narrative_steps.action: Log in using email and password.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Alex is redirected to their profile page upon successful login.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Profile
narrative_steps.description: Alex navigates to the 'Profile' section to view betting history.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Profile' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The profile section displays tabs for Betting History, Predictions Made, and Favorites.

requirement_tested: Ensure all frontend data is fetched from backend APIs without hardcoded values
user_persona: A QA engineer verifying that no mock data is used.
user_goal: To confirm that all data comes from backend APIs.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Data Sources
narrative_steps.description: The QA engineer opens browser developer tools to inspect network requests.
narrative_steps.action: Open browser DevTools and monitor network activity.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All data displayed on the page is fetched via API calls to the backend server, not hardcoded.
